p.d: Right in the heart of the Notre-Dame-de-Grâce district, Jean-Michel and Yann discover Greece with Zoé and her family. A menu of grilled octopus, saganaki cheese flambé and Greek dancing. There's no doubt about it, from 7 to 77 years-old the Greeks certainly know how to party! Presented by: Jean-Michel Péloquin, Yann Vallieres.
